name: Palm Springs Rendezvous

reviews.text: We chose Rendezvous based on all the great reviews and we were not disappointed. Everything was outstanding, from check in to check out. The staff is super friendly, our room (Stage Coach) was more than we expected and all of the add ons made our 25th Anniversary even more spectacular! We recommend Rendezvous without hesitation!
reviews.title: Outstanding in every way!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was my second time at Rendevous, previously stayed in Oct 2011. Loved it and Palm Springs i just had to add it to my trip. This time we stayed in the Shake Rattle & Roll room, most of the other rooms were taken so the decision was made for me. It was close to the road, i did think it might have some road noise but i never really noticed it. Its is a lovely big room with Elvis everywhere plus a separate shower/spa room, quite spacoius with a fire place to keep it cosy. Rendezvou feels like your staying at a friends place for the weekend, every one chats and you meet such wonderful people who have come to relax or escape the cold. The staff are outstanding, its everything the other reviews say. For me the thing i love is its nice and small and the pool and spa is only a few steps away from your room. The cocktails are always a highlight of the day, everyone gets together and its lovely to chat to the staff. It really feels like home. I will be back for sure, next October here i come.!!! Did i mention the beds..........so comfortable. I could go on forever.
reviews.title: As good as the first time

reviews.text: I visited Rendezvous again last month after already a very pleasant stay in September last year. This time I stayed in the Honeymoon Suite which was very nicely decorated and also had the amazing soft bed sheets as last time. The 3 course breakfast, home made cookies and happy hour cocktail with snacks were a real delicious treat.
reviews.title: A warm and welcome return to the Rendezvous

reviews.text: Everyone working at Rendezvous do everything they can to give you a great time. They can give you some good advise on where to go for restaurants, attractions etc. This time I also met the owner Barb who was very friendly just as JM, Chris and Betty and all other employees.
reviews.title: We loved it here..do palm springs!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I liked it again so much that I decided to pay them a second visit during my round trip through Southern and Central California. The second time I stayed in the Stagecoach room which is very nice as well. Actually you get a great view of the San Jacinto mountains. Also it is at the back of the property so you are a light sleeper this would be a good room for you. The same goes for the Silver Screen in which I stayed in September.
reviews.title: Do yourself a favour, stay here!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there because our friends recommended it. And we weren't disappointed.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It feels like you're back in time, authentic and cool 50's-60's vibe.
reviews.title: You need to stay here.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I really liked the touches of home-baked treats every evening in your room. Tasty too.
reviews.title: RENDEZVOUS HERE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is so much better than I expected. Every day it was a new smoothie, different fruit and a delicious main course.
reviews.title: An Enjoyable and Unique B&B experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Comfortable beds, the sheets are so soft.
reviews.title: Fantastic B&B experience

reviews.text: I absolutely loved The Rendezvous!! My friend and I were looking for a place to stay in Palm Springs for a girls weekend away. We did not want to pay all the extra charges for parking, wireless, resort fees, etc. We chose Rendezvous because of the excellent reviews we read on Tripadvisor and another website and what a find!!! The service from Betty, Barb, and all the staff was amazing. They treat you like family! Rooms were super comfortable and the breakfasts, appetizers, and daily treats were divine! I can't wait to go back with my husband for a romantic rendezvous!
reviews.title: Awesome Find!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a fantastic place to stay in Palm Springs! We book it based on the reviews we read here and were not disappointed. The Rendezvous definitely deserves five stars. We spent five nights there, three in Hawaiian Surf and two in Stagecoach. Both rooms were great but we really loved Stagecoach - big, clean and very comfortable. Great staff, great location and absolutely wonderful breakfasts - thanks JM and Barb! We will definitely be going back.
reviews.title: Wonderful B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I feel so fortunate to have experienced Rendezvous. Because we made some last minute changes to our reservation, we spent the first night at "Rebel without a cause" and the second night in "Honeymoon getaway". When we arrived we were welcomed by Barb and Betty, and Barb sat with us to give us all the info and details. That day we enjoyed the pool (with cool 50's music playing in the background) and the 5 O'clock appetizers and cocktails. It's such a nice touch! So thoughtful and generous.
reviews.title: Perfect B&B

reviews.text: We had a perfect night sleep in those huge beds with ultra soft sheets.
reviews.title: Great Getaway Spot!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The following morning we woke up and had breakfast at 10AM. They ask you when you check in what time will you be having breakfast (8:30 or 10am).
reviews.title: Awesome getaway!

reviews.text: Stayed in May 2013, the images of the property online are much nicer than the actual property itself. The hotel felt run down and the pool was not as nice as i had hoped; although it is very nice that the hotel offers a three course breakfast, i personally did not like the items they served and would rather have the option of choosing something simple like eggs and toast or cereal; I will say that the people who worked there were very friendly.
reviews.title: Not as nice as expected

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other negatives were there were hardly any restaurants within walking distance and they do not play any time of music by the pool, i stayed in the marilyn monroe room and the bed was uncomfortable and there was a lot of light shining in through the front door, I had to hang a blanket to keep the light out. I felt my overall experience was okay but have had better experiences at some of the other boutique hotels in Palm Springs. Will most likely not stay there again.
reviews.title: Great place to stay but some refurbishment is needed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in May 2013.
reviews.title: What a welcoming place!

reviews.text: The best points about this small hotel are:
reviews.title: Rockin' good times at the Rendezvous!
So Much Fun!
reviews.text: + quiet place only for adults

description: With brilliant colors and great themes this fabulous bed and breakfast hotel is an experience, not just another place to stay. From our scrumptious breakfast, luxurious massages, heated pool, and gorgeous courtyard, to our complimentary cocktail hour we pamper you all the way. All rooms feature a King bed, Flat Screen TV, DVD & CD players, Mini-fridge, Wi-Fi, Microwave, and most have whirlpool tubs. For a romantic trip to the desert this is it!
